anya-e1202n0:16_0: Vattabbameva ca bahumpi yato na vuttaṁ
anya-e1202n0:19_0: Vuccamānaṁ mayā sādhu vaṁsaṁ thūpassa satthunoti;
anya-e1202n0:20_0: Tattha thūpassa vaṁsaṁ vakkhāmīti ettha tathāgato arahaṁ sammā sambuddho thūpāraho,
anya-e1202n0:20_3: rājā cakkavatti thūpārahoti vacanato thūpārahānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kata cetiyaṁ abbhunana taṭṭhena thūpoti vuccati,
anya-e1202n0:20_4: idha pana kañcana mālika mahāthūpo adhippeto,
anya-e1202n0:20_5: so kassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā katoti ce?
anya-e1202n0:20_6: Yodīpaṅkarādīnaṁ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṁ santike laddhavyākaraṇo samatiṁsapāramiyo pūretvā paramābhisambodhiṁ
anya-e1202n0:20_7: patvā dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya yāva suhadda paribbājaka vinayāna sabba buddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:20_8: anupādiyesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto tassa bhagavato arahato sammā sambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:21_1: Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṁ catunnaṁ asaṅkheyyānaṁ matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:21_3: So aññaṁ kammaṁ akatvā brahmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṁsu.
anya-e1202n0:21_4: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhanako amacco āya potthakaṁ āharitvā suvaṇṇa rajata maṇimuttādi bharite gabbhe vivaritvā ettakaṁ te kumāra mātu santakaṁ,
anya-e1202n0:21_6: ettakaṁ ayyaka payyakānanti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhakaṁ ācikkhitvā etampaṭijaggāhīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:21_7: So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā agāraṁ ajjhāvasanto ekadivasaṁ cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:22_2: tathā nibbatta nibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṁ ahañca jānidhammo jarādhammo vyādhidhammo maraṇadhammo.
anya-e1202n0:22_3: Evaṁ bhūtena mayā ajāti ajaraṁ avyādhiṁ amaraṇaṁ sukhaṁ sītalaṁ nibbānaṁ gavesituṁ vaṭṭatīti nekkhammakāraṇaṁ
anya-e1202n0:22_4: cintetvā puna cintesi imaṁ dhanaṁ sabbaṁ mayhaṁ pitu pitāmahādayo paralokaṁ gacchantā eka kahāpaṇampi
anya-e1202n0:22_5: gahetvā nagatā mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti nagare bheriṁ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṁ
anya-e1202n0:22_6: datvā himavantassa pavisitvā tāpasa pabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
anya-e1202n0:23_0: Tadā dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā parayābhisambodhiṁ patvā satta sattāhaṁ bodhisamīpeceva vitināmetvā sunaṇdārāme
anya-e1202n0:23_1: dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā koṭisattānaṁ devamanussānaṁ dhammamataṁ pāyetvā cātuddīpika mahāmegho viya dhammavassaṁ
anya-e1202n0:23_2: vassento catūhi khīṇāsaya satasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārakaṁ caramāno ramma nagaraṁ patvā sudassana
anya-e1202n0:23_3: mahāvihāre paṭivasati tadā rammanagaravāsino sappi phaṇitādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā puppha dhūpa gaṇdhahatthā
anya-e1202n0:23_4: yena buddho tenapasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vaṇditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṁ nisīditvā dhammaṁ sutvā
anya-e1202n0:23_5: svātanāya bhagavantaṁ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṁ padakkhīnaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
anya-e1202n0:24_0: Te puna divase asadisa mahādānaṁ sajjetvā dasabalassa āgamana maggaṁ sodhenti.
anya-e1202n0:24_1: Tasmiṁ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assama padato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṁ tesaṁ manussānaṁ uparibhāgena
anya-e1202n0:24_2: ākāsena gacchantā te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṁ sodhente disvā kinnu kho kāraṇanti cintento sabbesaṁ passantānaṁyeva
anya-e1202n0:24_3: ākāsato oru ekamante ṭhatthāyaha te manusse pucchi.’Hambho kassa pana imaṁ maggaṁ sodhethā’ti te āhaṁsu
anya-e1202n0:24_4: bhante sumedha tumhe kiṁ naṁ jānātha,
anya-e1202n0:24_5: dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā paramābhisambodhiṁ patvā pavattavara dhammacakko janapada cārikaṁ caramāno anukkamena
anya-e1202n0:24_6: amhākaṁ nagaraṁ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1202n0:24_7: Mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ nimantayimha tassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṁ sodhemāti.
anya-e1202n0:24_10: pageva buddhuppādo tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṁ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṁ sodhetuṁ vaṭṭatīti so te manusse āha,
anya-e1202n0:24_11: sace bho tumhe imaṁ magga buddhassa sodhetha - sayahampi ekaṁ okāsaṁ sampaṭicchatvā ayaṁ sumedhapaṇḍito
anya-e1202n0:24_12: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti jānantā dubbisodhanaṁ udakasambhinnaṁ ativisamaṁ ekaṁ okāsaṁ sallakkhetvā imaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_1: Ahampanimaṁ okāsaṁ iddhīyā paramadassanīya kātuṁ pahomi evaṁ kato pana maṁ na paritoseti ajja pana mayā
anya-e1202n0:25_2: kāyaveyyāvaccaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatiti paṁsuṁ āharitvā taṁ pahesaṁ pūreni,
anya-e1202n0:25_3: tassa pana tasmiṁ padese asodhite jayasumana kusuma sadisi vaṇṇaṁ dupaṭṭacīvaraṁ timaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādetvā
anya-e1202n0:25_4: nivāsetvā tassupari yuṇṇamāpaṅgena kusumakalāpaṁ parakkhipanto viya vijjullatā sassīrīkaṁ kāyabaṇdhanaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_5: baṇdhitvā kanaka girisikhara matthake lākhārasaṁ parisiñcante viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṁ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto
anya-e1202n0:25_6: viya suvaṇṇaṅghakaṁ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya sarada samaya rajanikaraṁ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento
anya-e1202n0:25_7: viya ca lākhārasena tinna kiṁ sukaksumavaṇṇaṁ rattavara pasukūla cīvaraṁ pāripitvā gaṇdhakūgidva rato
anya-e1202n0:25_8: kanakaguhāto sīho viya nikkhamitvā jaḷabhiññānaṁyeva catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto amaragaṇa
anya-e1202n0:25_9: parivuto dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto mahā brahmā viya ca aparimita samaya samupacitāya kusalabalajanitāya
anya-e1202n0:25_10: anopamayā buddhalīlāya tārāgaṇaparivuto sarada samaya rajanikaro viya gaganatalaṁ alaṅgata paṭiyattaṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_1: Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato dvattiṁsa varalakkhaṇa
anya-e1202n0:26_2: patimaṇḍitaṁ asatiyā anubyañjanehi anubyañjitaṁ byāmappahāparikkhepa sassīrīkaṁ iṇdanīlamaṇisaṁkāsoākāse
anya-e1202n0:26_3: nānappakārā vijjullatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharaṁsiyo vissajjentaṁ rūpaggappattaṁ attabhāvaṁ oloketvā ajja
anya-e1202n0:26_4: mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati mā bhagavā kalale akkami maṇimayaṁ lakasetuṁ akkamanto
anya-e1202n0:26_5: viya saddhiṁ catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṁ akkamanto gacchatu taṁ me bhavissati dīgharattaṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_6: hitāya sukhāyāti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭā vākacīrāni kalela pattharitvā tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji nipanno
anya-e1202n0:26_7: ca sace ahaṁ iccheyyaṁ sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṁ paviseyyaṁ aññātakavesena
anya-e1202n0:26_8: pana me kilese ṇdhapetvā nibbānapattiyā kiccaṁ natthi,
anya-e1202n0:26_9: yaṁnūnāhaṁ dīpaṅkara dasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṁ patvā dhammanāvaṁ āropetvā mahājanaṁ saṁsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṁ.
anya-e1202n0:26_10: Idaṁ me patirupanti cintetvā aṭṭhadhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā nipajja.
anya-e1202n0:27_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgattvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsasāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṁ tāpasaṁ disvā ayaṁ tāpaso buddhatthāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā nipanto,
anya-e1202n0:27_1: ijjhissati nu kho etassa patthanā udāhu noti upadhārento - anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisa majjhe vyākāsi,
anya-e1202n0:27_2: passatha no tumhe bhikkhave imaṁ uggatapaṁ tāpasaṁ kalalapiṭṭhe nipannanti.
anya-e1202n0:27_4: ayaṁ yiddhatthāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā nipanno samijjhissati imassa patthatā kappasata sahassādhikānaṁ catuntaṁ
anya-e1202n0:27_5: asaṅkheyyānaṁ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti sabbaṁ vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n0:31_0: Passatha imaṁ tāpasaṁ - jaṭila uggatāpasaṁ aparimeyye ito kappe - ayaṁ buddho bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:39_1: pitā suddhodano nāma - ayaṁ hessati gotamo.
anya-e1202n0:40_0: Kolito upatisso ca - aggā hessanti sāvakā;
anya-e1202n0:42_0: Khemā uppalavaṇṇā ca - aggā hessanti sāvikā;
